text: is a Japanese triathlete. In 2018, she won the gold medal in the women's triathlon at the 2018 Asian Games in Jakarta, Indonesia. She also won the gold medal in the mixed relay event. == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Japanese female triathletes Category:Asian Games medalists in triathlon Category:Triathletes at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games
title: Yuko Takahashi
